name: scripts/engine.js

properties.name: hasToken
properties.description: true if current player has token.

name: randomInt
description: Returns a random integer between min and max.

name: shuffleArray
description: Naive shuffle an array, swaps random slots 3 * array.length times.

name: initDefaultGame
description: Initialize the default game setup.

unknown.tagValue: {Game} a game intialized with default rounds and no players.

return.description: a game intialized with default rounds and no players.

name: Clue
description: A single clue, zero indexed from the top left of the board.

name: Category
description: A category of clues on the board.

name: reset
description: Reset clues answered count to 0.

name: nextClue
description:
Retrieve next unanswered clue in the category, increment cluesAnswered.
If all clues are answered, this will return undefined.

throws.description: throw error when category is complete.

name: Board
description:
A WOJ board with column * row clues arranged in a grid. The top left
corner is indexed at 0. Each column is a {@link Category} and each row in a 
category is a {@link Clue}. All categories must have the same number of 
clues. Each clue in the first row has {@link Board#basePoints}. Each clue in
the next row equals the sum of the clue value in the prior row plus 
basePoints.

params.name: columns
params.description: number of columns on the board.

params.name: rows
params.description: number of rows on the board.

params.name: basePoints
params.description:
point value of each clues in the first 
row.

name: init_
description: Initializes an empty board of size columns * rows with {@link Clue}'s.

params.name: columns
params.description: number of columns on the board.

params.name: rows
params.description: number of rows on the board.

name: reset
description: Resets each category in the board and their cluesAnswered count to 0.

name: getCategory
description: Returns a category at the specified column.

name: getClue
description: Returns a clue at the specified column and row.

return.description: clue at the specified column and row.

name: editCategory
description: Edit the name of a category at column index.

name: editClue
description: Edit the question and answer of a clue at column and row index.

name: nextClue
description:
Retrieve next unanswered clue in the category at column and increment
cluesAnswered for that category. If all clues are answered, this will 
return undefined.

throws.description: throw error when board is complete.

name: import
description:
Import JSON board, initializing board and setting categories and clues.
Data should be a string. Use JSON.stringify if data is an object literal.

params.name: data.clues
params.description:
array of clues, zero indexed from top left
of board

name: export
description:
Export board content to JSON board string. See {@link Board.import} for
details on JSON board structure.

name: Spin
description: Result of a wheel spin.

params.name: slot
params.description: wheel slot number where spin landed.

params.name: sectorNumber
params.description: corresponding sector number located at slot.

params.name: sectorName
params.description: corresponding sector name located at slot.

params.name: clue
params.description:
if isCategory is true and spinAgain is false, next
clue in the category.

name: Wheel
description:
A WOJ wheel for a specific board and maximum spins. The number of slots on
the wheel will be the number of categories + the number of special sectors
(6). Slots are fixed on the wheel. Each special and category is a sector.
Each sector can be randomly assigned to a slot on the wheel. Categories are
always populated in the sector list first, followed by special sectors, i.e.
category 0 on the board is always sector 0 on the wheel.

name: reset
description: Resets used spins to 0.

name: assignSectors
description: Assigns sectors numbers to each slot ordered by categories then special.

name: randomizeSectors
description: Randomizes sectors in the slots.

name: getSectorNumber
description: Get sector number at a specific slot number.

return.description: sector number at the specified slot.

name: getSectorName
description: Get sector name for the specific sector number.

return.description: sector name for the sector number.

name: sectorIsCategory
description: Check if the sector is a category (vs a special sector).

return.description: true if the sector is a category.

name: getRandomSlot
description: Return a random slot number from the wheel.

name: spin
description:
Spins the wheel and returns a random sector. Populates the {@link Spin}
object with the spin results. If the result is a category, a clue will
be retrieved. If all clues are used, the spin again field will be
true.

unknown.tagValue: {Spin} object summarizing result of the spin.

return.description: object summarizing result of the spin.

name: Score
description: A score keeper for a single player and round.

name: reset
description: Reset points to 0.

name: increase
description: Increase points by a number (sign ignored).

name: decrease
description: Decrease points by a number (sign ignored).

name: bankrupt
description: If points are positive, set points to 0.

name: double
description: Double points, even if negative.

name: Player
description: A player in the WOJ game.

params.name: id
params.description: A unique numeric ID for the player.

name: resetTokens
description: Sets the player's tokens to 0.

name: resetScore
description: Reset score for round to 0.

params.name: round
params.description: number of the round, 0 is round 1.

name: getScore
description: Return the score for a given round number.

unknown.tagValue: {number} score for the given round number.

params.name: round
params.description: number of the round, 0 is round 1.

return.description: score for the given round number.

name: addToken
description: Adds 1 token to the player's tokens.

name: hasToken
description: Checks if the player has any tokens.

unknown.tagValue: true if the player has at least one token.

return.description: true if the player has at least one token.

name: useToken
description: Deduct a token, if the player has one.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if the token was deducted.

return.description: true if the token was deducted.

throws.description: throws error if the player has no tokens.

name: Round
description: A round in the WOJ game. The standard game is played with two rounds.

params.name: id
params.description: A unique numeric ID for the round.

params.name: players
params.description: an array of players in the game.

params.name: maxTime
params.description:
maximum time to answer a question in
seconds.

name: stats
description:
Stats for the current round, including spins used, clues answered, and
attributes for the player who has the current turn, e.g. score, tokens.

name: currentPlayer
description: Current player's player object.

name: currentPlayerScore_
description: Current player's score object.

name: start
description: Start the WOJ round.

name: reset
description: Resets the current round by reseting the wheel, board, and player scores.

name: spin
description:
Spins the wheel and returns the result in a Spin object. If Free Turn,
Bankrupt, or Double Score are landed, the players tokens or score is
adjusted. If Player's Choice or Opponent's Choice are landed, use
pickCategory to get the next clue.

name: pickCategory
description:
When spin is Player's Choice or Opponent's Choice, use pickCategory,
to get the next clue from the specificed category. This will set the
currentClue.

unknown.tagValue: {Clue} next unanswered clue in the category.

return.description: next unanswered clue in the category.

throws.description:
throws error if current spin sector does not permit
 picking a category, i.e. it is not Player's Choice or Opponents Choice.

name: validAnswer
description:
When Spin resulted in a clue or pickCategory was used to set a clue, call
this method if the player answered correctly, to adjust their score.

throws.description: throws error if no clue is set to validate.

name: invalidAnswer
description:
When Spin resulted in a clue or pickCategory was used to set a clue, call
this method if the player answered incorrectly, to adjust their score.

throws.description: throws error if no clue is set to validate.

name: resetTurn_
description:
Private method to reset the turn: currentSpin and currentClue are set
to undefined.

name: useToken
description:
Use a free turn token for the current player. A token may be used if the
player loses his turn or answers a question incorrectly. A token cannot
be used if the player spins free turn.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} true if succesfully used token, false otherwise.

return.description: true if succesfully used token, false otherwise.

throws.description: throws error if player does not have any tokens.
throws error if the current spin is Free Turn.

name: endTurn
description:
End the current players turn, should be called after a spin and
validation (if applicable) is complete. This method will switch to the
next player and reset the currentSpin and currentClue.

name: Game
description:
The WOJ game. Supports creation of board, wheel, and players which are
used to track game play. This class should be used to create games and add
rounds to ensure proper functionality.

name: addPlayer
description:
Add a player to the game. Players are assigned an ID starting with 0 and
incrementing by 1.

name: getPlayer
description: Retrieve a player.

name: editPlayer
description: Retrieve and edit a player.

params.name: id
params.description: the players id number, player one is id: 0.

name: addRound
description:
Add and initialize a game round with an empty wheel and board. Rounds are
assigned an ID starting with 0 and incrementing by 1.

name: getRound
description: Retrieve a game round by id.

params.name: id
params.description: the rounds id number, round one is id: 0

name: scripts/ui.js

content:
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/TeamVelocity/teamvelocity.github.io.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/TeamVelocity/teamvelocity.github.io)
[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/TeamVelocity/teamvelocity.github.io/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/TeamVelocity/teamvelocity.github.io?branch=master)

# teamvelocity.github.io
Source code for the Wheel of Jeopardy Game developed by Team Velocity.

## Developer Tools

        # install documentation
        npm install

        # test code, view test coverage, and generate docs
        npm run test
        npm run coverage
        npm run docs

package.json
